account_transferring_out: We're transferring your account now. It may take a minute or two.
account_transferred_out: We completed the account transfer. Please restart your client so you can log in to the destination region.
account_transfer_conditions_p1: You may not have access to region specific features, including: language options, local payment methods and Player Support in your language
account_transfer_conditions_p2: Your ping may be higher than your previous region
account_transfer_conditions_p3: Your friends list will transfer with you
account_transfer_conditions_p4: Your event progress and missions will transfer with you
account_transfer_conditions_p5: Once you transfer to a different region, you can't transfer it again for 90 days.
account_transfer_conditions_p6: For more details regarding account transfers, please see our FAQ here.
summoner_name_change_complete_message: Congratulations!  Your new Summoner name will take effect on your next login.  Please restart your client.
notifications_store_gift_mystery_details: {{sender}} has summoned you a mystery gift
notifications_error_details: An unexpected error occured. Error Code: {{errorCode}}
gift_recipient_ineligible_min_level: Your friend's summoner level is too low to receive this gift.
